definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: The yearly output of this factory approximates to 500,000 tons.
sentences.chinese: 這座工廠的年產量約計爲五十萬噸。

sentences.english: The yearly output approximates to 500,000 tons.
The yearly output approximates to 600,000 tons.
